chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: The LORD reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.
items.plainText: The LORD reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.

items.text: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.
items.plainText: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.

items.text: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.
items.plainText: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.

items.text: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.
items.plainText: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.

items.text: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
items.plainText: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.

items.text: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.
items.plainText: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.

items.text: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.
items.plainText: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.

items.text: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O LORD.
items.plainText: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O LORD.

items.text: For thou, LORD, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.
items.plainText: For thou, LORD, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.

items.text: Ye that love the LORD, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.
items.plainText: Ye that love the LORD, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.

items.text: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.
items.plainText: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.

items.text: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
items.plainText: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
